name: Meliora’s Detective Simulator
description:
This game is a text based simulation that focuses on the life of a detective. You must read many different crime stories and find the real criminal in them. An old-school game genre is coming back with modern mechanics and clean graphics.

  • Collect important informations from the crime reports and decide wisely. Find the real criminal.
  • There are 50 different crime stories to read and all of them have their own options.
  • If you choose a wrong decision, you will be informed why you made a mistake.
  • More stories will be added in time.
